ีีธึีถีพีกึีซ 24-ีจ UNESCO-ีถ ีฐีผีนีกีฏีฅีฌ ีง ิฟึีฉีธึีฉีตีกีถ ึ ึ ึ ีฏีธีน ีง ีกึีฅีฌ ีกีตีถ ีถีพีซึีฅีฌ ีกีฟีฅีฌีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีญีธีฝึีซ ีคีฅีด ีบีกีตึีกึีซีถึ ิปีถีน ีญีธีฝึ, ีกีฟีฅีฌีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีพีกีฟ ีขีกีถ ีง, ีกีตีถ ีฏีฅีฒีฅึีธึีด ีง ีดีกึีคีฏีกีถึ ึ ีขีฅึีธึีด ีคีชีขีกีญีฟีธึีฉีตีธึีถึ ีีกีฏีกีตีถ ีซีถีนีบีฅีีฝ ีฐีกีฝีถีฅีฌ ีคึีกีถ ีฐีกีฟีฏีกีบีฅีฝ ีกีตีถ ีฐีกีฝีกึีกีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีธึีด, ีธึีฟีฅีฒ ีกีฟีฅีฌีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฑึีกีพีธึีดีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีฐีซีดีถีกีพีธึ ีถีกีญีกีคึีตีกีฌีถีฅึ ีฏีกีถึ ิตึ ีกึีคีตีธึ ีฝีฅึีจ ีฏีฐีกีฒีฉีซี ีกีฟีฅีฌีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจึ

media:group.media:description:
ยซิฑึึีกีญีตีกีถ ีคีซีฟีกีถีฏีตีกีถยป ีถีธึ ีฉีธีฒีกึีฏีดีกีถีจ ีพีฅึีฌีธึีฎีกีขีกีถ ีีซีฃึีกีถ ิณึีซีฃีธึีตีกีถีถ ีธึ ีฌึีกีฃึีธีฒ ิบีกีถีถีก ิฑีพีกีฃีตีกีถีจ ึีถีถีกึีฏีธึีด ีฅีถ ีีธึีฝีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีกึีฟีฃีธึีฎีถีกีญีกึีกึ ีีฅึีฃีฅีต ิผีกีพึีธีพีซ ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถ-ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถ ีญีกีฒีกีฒีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฃีธึีฎีจีถีฉีกึีซ ีพีฅึีกีขีฅึีตีกีฌึ ินีธีฒีกึีฏีดีกีถ ีจีถีฉีกึึีธึีด ีกีถีคึีกีคีกึีฑ ีง ีฏีกีฟีกึีพีธึีด ีถีธีตีฅีดีขีฅึีซ 9-ีซ ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีกึีคีซีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถีจ, ีซีถีนีบีฅีฝ ีถีกึ ีถึีกีถ, ีฉีฅ ีซีถีนีบีฅีฝ ีีธึีฝีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ีฟีกีบีกีฌีฅึ ีกีตีฌ ีคีฅึีกีฏีกีฟีกึีถีฅึีซ ีดีซีปีถีธึีคีกีฏีกีถ ีถีกีญีกีฑีฅีผีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจ ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีงีฉีถีซีฏ ีฆีฟีดีกีถีจ ีถีกีญีธึีคีกีฎ ีทึีปีกีถีธึีดึ

entry.title: Armenia lifts entry ban on 2 diaspora community leaders

media:group.media:title: Armenia lifts entry ban on 2 diaspora community leaders
media:group.media:description:
๐Armeniaโs top diplomat called Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyevโs latest claims against the country a โsetbackโ in ongoing peace efforts. ๐The European Unionโs foreign policy chief has warned Azerbaijan of โsevere consequencesโ for any future incursions into Armenia. ๐The United States remains committed to mediating peace talks between Armenia and Azerbaijan, according to a State Department spokesperson. ๐Two community leaders in the Armenian diaspora who were barred from entering Armenia have had their bans lifted after suing.

entry.title: What is required to invest in innovative projects #shorts

media:group.media:title: What is required to invest in innovative projects #shorts
media:group.media:description:
In this episode, we explore the life of Armen Kherlopian, Ph.D., a scientist, researcher, angel investor, and advisor to the board of several prominent corporations. We discuss the relevance of artificial intelligence, data sciences, and innovations for tomorrow. With a background in biomedical engineering and biophysics, we assess how Dr. Kherlopian entered the world of entrepreneurship, investments, and startups and how he makes sense of a world increasingly dependent on machine learning. Finally, we explore Dr. Kherlopianโs historical and family legacies from Aintab and Marash, which have been pivotal in his successes and mission to push boundaries in tech and sciences and contribute to the betterment of our world. Watch full interview: https://youtu.be/j6kQD8148TQ
